https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q3hOiG6gosHgv7QZqFcFOQ2nJwI.jpg Former WBC heavyweight world champion and boxing superstar Deontay "The Bronze Bomber" Wilder makes his long-awaited return to the ring to battle top-rated Robert “The Nordic Nightmare” Helenius in an explosive 12-round battle between ferocious punchers in the main event of a FOX Sports PBC Pay-Per-View. Deontay Wilder vs. Robert Helenius
